subject: Running
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: Since the elite women’s race in the New York marathon begins a half-hour before the elite men’s start, those not fast enough to contend could be on their own for most of the race.
snippet: Since the elite women’s race in the New York marathon begins a half-hour before the elite men’s start, those not fast enough to contend could be on their own for most of the race.
